name: URL Shortener
backend_requirements: POST /api/shorten - accept long URL, generate 6-character random code
URL model: id, original_url, short_code (unique), created_at, click_count
GET /:code - lookup and redirect to original URL, increment counter
frontend_requirements: Input field for long URL with 'Shorten' button
Display shortened URL with copy-to-clipboard button
Show click count for generated URLs
